channel.title: I've been banned maybe by mistake?
channel.description:
This is Akriam for those of you who couldn't figure it out ;D
About a week ago, when I tryed going into the graphics sections, it came up with an error saying I was banned for posting trojans (which I did not!). So, I Emailed the admins and they never got back to me. Everytime I clicked on something I got this error. So, I am using FireFox now, and it let me register, but when I use AOL, it says I have been banned...My account did not get deleated, it got banned, so if someone would kindly answer, where did I post trojans, and if it was a mistake, can you restor my account?
Thanks, Akriam

item.title: I've been banned maybe by mistake?
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

and my friend who lives in the same city has this problem also[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 01:11:00 PM[/size][hr]HEY IT WORKED YAY!

Read full topic

item.title: I've been banned maybe by mistake?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

hmm thats strange bobdole, im using aol as well, but i dont get the banned message, but i come here from like hours of not being here and try to post something and it says a posting from my ip address has already posted in the last 20 seconds, but i hadnt posted all day :s so does someone have the same ip as me?

Read full topic
item.source: I've been banned maybe by mistake?

item.title: I've been banned maybe by mistake?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

It seems to be a ip conflict with another user who was banned for posting trojans (3 times as I recall) and who apparantly has the same isp as you do. I’ve tried removing some of the ips banned - tell me if it helps.

Read full topic
